articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: The Sequel To 'godzilla Vs. Kong' Will Begin Filming In Australia This Year
articlepost.excerpt: 'Godzilla vs. Kong' was also shot in Queensland, Australia in 2021.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: Actor who played Gilgamesh in the Eternals is said to be returning for a new MCU film or show.
articlepost.excerpt: Don Lee, who played Gilgamesh in the Eternals, is rumored to be reprising his role as Gilgamesh in a secret MCU Phase 4 film or series set to begin production this summer.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: Gilgamesh from The Eternals, Approves of His MCU Action Figure
articlepost.excerpt: Don Lee, who plays Gilgamesh in Marvel's The Eternals, is seen approving of Hot Toys' action figurines based on his role.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: After No Way Home, Marisa Tomei Wants To Reprise Her Role As Aunt May In The Marvel Cinematic Universe
articlepost.excerpt: Following her sad death in last year's Spider-Man: No Way Home, Marisa Tomei confesses that she would love to reprise her role as Aunt May.

articlepost.author: Kevin Miles
articlepost.title: The Oscar-nominated Director Of Drive My Car Doesn't Know How To Drive
articlepost.excerpt: Despite the film's subject matter, Ryusuke Hamaguchi, the director of Best Picture candidate Drive My Car, has stated that he does not know how to drive.
